chapter.title: Image Service API v2
chapter.para: Image Service API v2.0, API v2.1, and API v2.2.

section.title: Images
section.para: Creates, updates, and deletes image metadata records. Enables users to share images with each other. Also, uploads and downloads raw image data.

section.title: Image schemas
section.para: Gets a JSON-schema document that represents an images or image entity.
